<swiper-container #swiperRef [config]="config" (activeindexchange)="onActiveIndexChange()" class="w-[310px] h-[450px] pb-6 bg-blue-600 " >
  <ng-container   *ngFor="let item of sliders">
    <swiper-slide class="sliders">{{item}}</swiper-slide>
  </ng-container>
</swiper-container>
